author: Mrs Gabeva
text:
One can wish at least a month to pass before VC does something outrageous again, but yes, it is way too much to ask for a low level company full of inexperienced, incompetent and lazy employees whose actions are obviously tolerated by the management to complete the  circle of idiocy. 
My question is - why bother to give a detailed description of the items why nobody will even bother to read them. In this case - how do they find an item non-compliant as they have never read the description. In this case - a Chanel sweater, very good condition with one loose seam on a button. All this is explained in the description (even with the caption “attention” and there is even a picture of it. To be clear. I also have taken a screenshot of the description (i always do before sending my items and I recommend all of you do the same, because the sneaky ways of VC trying to cover their own incompetencies are numerous). Now, they sent a quality report that they “found” a tiny issue with the item - “loose seam”. Hello?!?! It has been duly described and shown on a picture. So, to say i am surprised- not at all, it is VC and their bunch of idiotic actions are always expected. But should we keep silent? Absolutely not. Their ratings are dropping and rightfully so. Because customers should voice their experiences and attract attention to VC’s multiple, constant, never ending and growing list of wrongdoings and the reapeting avoidance of  taking any accountability for their lack of professionalism and unfairness which has been ongoing and tolerated within the company. Seems like an official company internal rule.
title: Totally disgusting

author: Lara Trindade
text:
This application is not democratic:
. doesn’t allow you to sell all type of articles
. VC always crops the main photo, doesn’t allow to submit the original photo. And not always does a good cropping job.. many times I had to resubmit the item to get a decent and attractive photo.
. VC charges high commission for the service it provides
. VC has a terrible customer support. Sometimes you end up speaking with 10 different people to resolve your issue. It also takes quite some time to receive a response.
. It’s terrible that you don’t have a contact number to call.
Its also bad that you don’t have much information about how to present a formal complaint.
.VC doesn’t allow you to edit the adds. Its a nightmare. If you want to change something in the listing.. you have to resubmit.. which doesn’t makes much sense
. The items also take quite some time do be live. 



Overall I think other apps liked VINTED for example, are a lot more flexible and easy to work than VC
title: This application is not democratic:

author: Hristina
text:
A fair update on my previous reviews: 
After long and unfruitful months of correspondence, finally, both of my two dissapeared parcels have been refunded. 
HOWEVER, receiving a payment with such a delay, more than two months after the sale, is calling for some amends , bigger than a "we apologize for the inconvenience". I have a good deal of my  time, nerves and energy lost, trying to sort out this mess, that your customer support has been so reluctant to resolve.
Pretty much pointless, I sold a worthy piece for far less, because I needed the money fast... According to your updated lower selling fees, I would have made 100 EUR more on this sale, even if I have kept the same price. 
I find it truly awkward, that you still have deducted fully your selling fee of 310.00 EUR from my bag, even though you have made no sale whatsoever. 
It feels truly diminishing towards the whole "customer experience" horror story , that you put me through.

I hope you find some useful constructive criticism in this review and you just might achieve in the future the customer satisfaction, that you claim to strive for.
title: Update. Finally, refund has been made.

author: Mrs Jean Butler
text:
Appalling treatment. I have sold over 420 items. All our items were were submitted in the usual way where it states our curators will check your submitted items fit within the brand standards. All were listed and therefore were suitable for sale and all of our items where the buyer had requested passed your inspection tests at your hub. Last week I had and e mail to say that my account was being removed on the grounds that several of our sold items did not meet compliance. That’s very strange as you approved them to go on your website once submitted your curation team will carefully check the brand standards and all had passed authentication. The infringement of your terms I am supposed to have breached is not on your website which is illegal. Neither was I invited to show proof of purchase to prove my case. I also notice that other sellers in France Austria Germany U.K. and France are selling the same items. Why haven’t you banned them. Or is this treatment just for me. I don’t understand at all what I am supposed to have done 
I was told my account was deleted so cannot conclude any business outstanding. My profile is still there and it states that I am temporarily unavailable which is a lie. Also since my ban you have let 2 sales go through that I cannot send as I cannot get into my account. You are using my items as bait to attract buyers that cannot buy. So 2 buyers that have purchased since my ban are left disappointed that is firmly on the Vestiaire and not on me 
There are several outstanding cases that I need closure on. They have been outstanding for some time but I cannot see anything on my account as I am now banned so cannot see their progress. I am not going to accept that you just delete and keep my property I am quite happy to take either you or the buyers to the small claims court to get my money or items back 

Item number 19380526 out for delivery since January 12th please pay me or return my item I cannot see an update as I am not allowed into my account 

Item number 20203611 and item number 20203611. The buyer purchased 4 pairs of earrings. These two pairs were the same style but different colours. She claimed that they were used. That is impossible as I don’t have pierced ears and all our jewellery is new and authentic. It was a way of try before you buy. No report was sent to me and no evidence provided ie photos. Please return my two items or pay me. This is theft

Item number19345203. Sold on 27th November. The buyer claimed they were broken upon arrival. They were well packed and sent out in perfect condition. Why would I send a broken pair of earrings? I was not given any report. So upon enquiries several weeks later as they had not been returned to me I was told she had been allowed to keep them for a further week to try to effect a repair. This was without my consent and illegal. When I got them back one earring was broken in two and half melted. The damage was made far worse as some one had try to solder them. Looking in the packaging there was just a lump of melted metal from a botched repair. Please pay me for my item as you allowed further damage to my item without my consent. These were sent out in perfect condition 

Item number 20267011 was at your hub when you banned me. Surprise surprise a tiny issue with them. But I could not see the report as you have banned me. Please return my item I will wait to see what the issue is as these were in perfect condition when sent. I cannot re sell them as you have banned me 

I cannot express my disgust enough at the way I have been treated. As I say I am happy to sue you or the buyers to get my property back. I am also happy to go to the media to tell them how I have tried and convicted. And how badly you treat people with no consistent policy. As others are still selling the same items. I find it amazing that you are using my items as bait and wrongfully telling buyers to check back later. On the day I was banned without explanation I found out I was seriously ill. So please conclude the above as quickly as possible so I don’t have to waste any more time on your ridiculous company that make the rules up as they go along. If my sold items did not meet compliance please refund the £6000 in fees I have paid. I cannot wait to part company

Thank you for your reply there is a further item that needs attending to. The item number is 20267315 these have been outstanding since 20th January. Please advise as soon as possible
title: Appalling treatment

author: M_Gi
text: I buy and sell across all major platforms as a side hobby and Vestaire Collective is one of the worst to use as a buyer (haven't successfully sold anything on it either).  My recent order was a used piece of luggage purchased from Italy to be shipped to the US.  They collected nearly $200 in tax and customs duties yet never actually filed them on the shipment (box would have had the paperwork on it).  AKA they just ripped me off $200, not to mention ebay sellers never charge you duties and just ship you the item.  The fees really rack up when buying on here.  They also shipped it atrociously packaged and the box was completely open when it arrived.

author: Denis
text:
Yes, I do know the time limit for a complaint, I already mentioned that, I missed it and that's why I resold it.

But still, even with no fees it would be impossible to resell it for nearly the same amount since the condition doesn't match the description at all.

Also doesn't change the fact that it is impossible to get in touch with you directly and to get justice for the insanely bad packaging plus the overall very bad condition of the product.

Thank you for the coupon for this but it still makes me sad that people dont care about correct packaging.

I do understand that vintage clothing can smell especially when using perfume but that wasn't just a slight smell it literally was covered in it.

And when something like thick silk clothing gets insanely folded in a way too small package by literal brute force the condition of the product gets way worse, there are also buttons and the zipper involved.

And about the jewellery, it is a 50 euro (seller personal offer, not mine!) + 30 euro (fee/brexit) ring with an artificial stone which is of course obvious but the bad manufacturing (the associated scratches and notches) were not mentioned at all.

I can't post/link pictures here but I can provide them if needed.

I would say it was just a cheap buy but the quality is like its coming out from a gumball machine and not from your website.

I am talking about this item: Ref : 18626260

I did keep it since I paid half of its worth for customs duty/fee (GB to Germany) and it is literally impossible for me to resell it without scamming someone else.

The seller of these products is (in my opinion) not legit, you can literally see it in his duplicated offers and products, nothing there is unique, with another price but the same pictures and you keep accepting/listing them!

Look at this new offer it is the same what I bought:
Ref. 20911377

If you allow people selling the exact same low quality products over and over with wrong/misleading descriptions it has nothing to do with the standards you try to represent!
title: issues with packaging and quality
